A0: SENATE Majority Leader Alan Peter Cayetano on Monday
RelatedSentence: Cayetano said he wants to know if the alleged fertilizer fund scam is interrelated with alleged misuse of the Priority Development Assistance Fund Scam ( PDAF ) of lawmakers and the Malampaya fund scam .
The senator said that there is a big possibility that these funds were used by the previous administration of President Gloria Macapagal Arroyo during the 2004 national elections .
